title: These Are the Sporty Basics Fashion People Wear for Summer—and They're All on Sale for Amazon Prime Day
author: Audry Hiaoui
excerpt: From workout dresses to matching sets, here are the best Amazon Prime Day activewear deals to shop before the sale ends.
text: A few months ago, I wrote about how—for a long time—workout clothes had been a category I didn’t prioritize—but that I was finally ready to invest in some. Since then, I now have a drawer of matching sets, which always feels nice to wear to the gym.When I went down a rabbit hole of researching where to buy exercise basics (aka consulting TikTok), one of the first places that came up was Amazon. From its in-house Amazon Essentials line to brands like Beyond Yoga, it’s become many people’s go-to for athleisure. Whether you’re heading to the gym, playing a sport, or just going on long walks, a few of my favorite keywords for finding chic options: workout dresses, golf clothes, and tennis clothes.Since Amazon Prime Day ends tomorrow, I’ve put together a list of pieces that are on sale and worth checking out—from sporty dresses to matching sets. Criss-cross grip socks for pilates. Beyond Yoga Spacedye Starting Line Dress One of my favorite brands for workout clothes is Beyond Yoga—the softest. Beyond Yoga Spacedye Points Crossover Skirt I have a collection of skorts I wear all the time. Amazon Essentials One Shoulder Strappy Back Sports Bra A one-shoulder sports bra. Amazon Essentials Workout Capris CRZ YOGA Butterluxe Adjustable Spaghetti Strap Sports Bra I keep seeing Crz Yoga on TikTok. CRZ YOGA Butterluxe Biker Shorts Specifically their butterluxe line. QINSEN Workout Tennis Dress SANTINY Pleated Tennis Skirt White tennis skirts are perfect for summer. Beyond Yoga Spacedye Slim Racerback Cropped Tank Beyond Yoga Spacedye High Waisted Legging Amazon Essentials V-Neck Sports Bra Amazon Essentials has a whole section of athleisure. Amazon Essentials Full Length Yoga Leggings I always like contrast trim. CRZ YOGA Butterluxe Adjustable Spaghetti Strap Sports Bra When I really like a set, I just end up buying it in a few different colors. CRZ YOGA Butterluxe Biker Shorts Which makes it so easy to get dressed and be out the door when I'm going to the gym.
html:
A few months ago, I wrote about how—for a long time—workout clothes had been a category I didn’t prioritize—but that I was finally ready to invest in some. Since then, I now have a drawer of matching sets, which always feels nice to wear to the gym.

When I went down a rabbit hole of researching where to buy exercise basics (aka consulting TikTok), one of the first places that came up was Amazon. From its in-house Amazon Essentials line to brands like Beyond Yoga, it’s become many people’s go-to for athleisure. Whether you’re heading to the gym, playing a sport, or just going on long walks, a few of my favorite keywords for finding chic options: workout dresses, golf clothes, and tennis clothes.

Since Amazon Prime Day ends tomorrow, I’ve put together a list of pieces that are on sale and worth checking out—from sporty dresses to matching sets.

Criss-cross grip socks for pilates.

Beyond Yoga

Spacedye Starting Line Dress

One of my favorite brands for workout clothes is Beyond Yoga—the softest.

Beyond Yoga

Spacedye Points Crossover Skirt

I have a collection of skorts I wear all the time.

Amazon Essentials

One Shoulder Strappy Back Sports Bra

A one-shoulder sports bra.

Amazon Essentials

Workout Capris

CRZ YOGA

I keep seeing Crz Yoga on TikTok.

Which makes it so easy to get dressed and be out the door when I'm going to the gym.
